Package com.threerings.nexus.io

Interface Summary
Serializer An automatically generated class that knows about all Streamable and NexusService classes that will be used by a client.
Streamable An interface implemented by objects that will be streamed over the network.
Streamer<T> An interface implemented by generated streamer classes.
 

Class Summary
AbstractSerializer A basic Serializer implementation that handles standard types.
Streamable.Input The means by which Streamable instances read their data from a remote source.
Streamable.Output The means by which Streamable instances write their data to a remote source.
Streamers Defines streamers for all of the basic types supported by Nexus.
Streamers.Streamer_Boolean A streamer for Boolean.
Streamers.Streamer_Byte A streamer for Byte.
Streamers.Streamer_Character A streamer for Character.
Streamers.Streamer_Double A streamer for Double.
Streamers.Streamer_Enum<T extends Enum<T>> A streamer for Enum classes.
Streamers.Streamer_Float A streamer for Float.
Streamers.Streamer_Integer A streamer for Integer.
Streamers.Streamer_List<T> A streamer for List.
Streamers.Streamer_Long A streamer for Long.
Streamers.Streamer_Map<K,V> A streamer for Map.
Streamers.Streamer_Null A streamer for null instances.
Streamers.Streamer_Set<T> A streamer for Set.
Streamers.Streamer_Short A streamer for Short.
Streamers.Streamer_String A streamer for String.
 

Exception Summary
StreamException An exception thrown if an error occurs when reading or writing Streamable data.
